Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
14.07.2011 SCR16602 Fixed problem with DSQL for DEBH selections
11.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
29.03.2011 SH SCR16319 Fixed problem with storing temp rows in case of missing DCMO rows
-- Clean up temp table
-- Determine debtors for further selections
-- Determine period for further selections
... monthly (max 2 years --> current year and last year)
... selection of DCMO last 12 month (incl. current month)
... quarterly (max 2 years --> current year and last year)
... selection of DCMO from last 12 month (incl. current month)
... yearly (max 4 years --> current year and last 3 years)
... selection of DCMO from last 36 month + number of month of current year)
-- Start to popluate Temptable
... calculate outstanding totals
... calculate balance, sales, disputes

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum (DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_OUT_AMO_TOTAL_H, cast(sum (DEBB_ACTINVAC) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_OUT_AMO_TOTAL_C, cast(sum (DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING) as decimal(9,0)) TEMP_OUT_NUM_TOTAL from :1/DEBB :4 join :1/DEBC on :3 :2 where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO for fetch only

Text.val: @In case of called from ODH000 (tab5) the join on DEBH has to be done before the
join on DEBC, else if called from ODC000 (tab10) it's the other way around

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DCMO_YEAR DCMO_YEAR, DCMO_MONTH DCMO_MONTH, cast(sum (DCMO_TOTASALESDEBTNOTES) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_AMO_SALES_DEBIT_NOTES, cast(sum (DCMO_TOTASALESCREDNOTES) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_AMO_SALES_CREDIT_NOTES, cast(sum (DCMO_TOTNDEBTNOTES) as decimal(9,0)) TEMP_NUM_SALES_DEBIT_NOTES, cast(sum (DCMO_TOTNCREDNOTES) as decimal(9,0)) TEMP_NUM_SALES_CREDIT_NOTES, cast(sum (DCMO_BALANCELO) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_AMO_LOWEST_BALANCE, cast(sum (DCMO_BALANCEHI) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_AMO_HIGHEST_BALANCE, cast(sum (DCMO_ANEWDISPUTES) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_AMO_NEW_DISPUTES, cast(sum (DCMO_ADISPUTESSOLVED) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_AMO_DISPUTES_SOLVED, cast(sum (DCMO_ADISPUTESBOOKEDOFF) as decimal(13,2)) TEMP_AMO_DISPUTES_BOOKED_OFF, cast(sum (DCMO_NNEWDISPUTES) as decimal(9,0)) TEMP_NUM_NEW_DISPUTES, cast(sum (DCMO_NDISPUTESSOLVED) as decimal(9,0)) TEMP_NUM_DISPUTES_SOLVED, cast(sum (DCMO_NDISPUTESBOOKEDOFF) as decimal(9,0)) TEMP_NUM_DISPUTES_BOOKED_OFF, cast(sum (DCMO_NDUNNINGLETTERS) as decimal(9,0)) TEMP_NUM_DUNNING_LETTERS_SENT from :1/DCMO :6 join :1/DEBC on :3 :2 where DCMO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':4' and :5 group by DCMO_YEAR , DCMO_MONTH order by DCMO_YEAR desc, DCMO_MONTH desc for fetch only

Text.val: @In case of called from ODH000 (tab5) the join on DEBH has to be done before the
join on DEBC, else if called from ODC000 (tab10) it's the other way around
